definition: delicate as a flower, refined as a precious jade (idiom)/(of a woman) exquisite
flower/blossom/CL:朵[duo3],支[zhi1],束[shu4],把[ba3],盆[pen2],簇[cu4]/fancy pattern/florid/to spend (money, time)/(coll.) lecherous/lustful

sentences.english: Edmond, you have a very beautiful lady-love.
sentences.chinese: 爱德蒙你拥有一位如花似玉的爱人。

definition: lit. countenance of a flower, face like the moon (idiom)/fig. (of a woman) beautiful
divine fragrance, national grace (idiom); an outstanding beauty
(of a woman) lovely as a flower (idiom)/beautiful
(of a girl) in the prime of youth
lit. capable of causing the downfall of a city or state (idiom)/fig. (of a woman) devastatingly beautiful
lit. capable of causing the downfall of a city or state (idiom)/fig. (of a woman) devastatingly beautiful/also written 傾城傾國|倾城倾国[qing1 cheng2 qing1 guo2]
lit. hiding the moon, shaming the flowers (idiom)/fig. female beauty exceeding even that of the natural world
middle-aged but still attractive woman/lady of a certain age
national grace, divine fragrance (idiom); an outstanding beauty
lit. fish sink, goose alights (idiom, from Zhuangzi 莊子|庄子); fig. female beauty captivating even the birds and beasts
